column47: I'm nearly at the end of this video and i just wanted to say how grateful i am that buzz reunited and decided to release more songs for us. I became a fan last year and i can't imagine my whole life without knowing this amazing band. Yejun, Woohyun, Junki, Sunghee, and Kyunghoon, thank you for still choosing each other after all those years.
